Recommender: That's a must. What was the last movie you've recently? Seeker: It was actually return of the jedi last night. I love action films and all the Terminator movies Recommender: I love those as well. Have you heard about Bad Boys 3 coming out this Jan with Will Smith and Martin Lawrence. It's got plenty of action and long overdue for part 3. Seeker: No I've never heard of that, what's the story line? Recommender: Well you'll definitely have to catch up on the other 2. It's about two cops in Miami who are best friends. Ones a more tied down family man and the other is a big time playboy who like to live the lavish life. Although they both live completely different lifestyles, they work really well together. It's a very grounded buddy cop movie with plenty of action and comedy. A hit sequel came out and now after many years a third is going to be released in January. Seeker: Well I better watch the first two before that one comes out! Recommender: Since you enjoy action films have you heard and seen the fast and furious franchise? Seeker: Yeah I have seen those. I kind of like corny 80's action movies more Recommender: Say no more. Are you more of a Stallone? Van Damme? or Scharzenegger fan? Seeker: Definitely Schwarzenegger Recommender: So I got two awesome choices you can tell me, which you prefer to hear more about. His awesome 80s hit Predator or Last Action Hero? Although the second one came in the very early 90's I still have to add that because it's very underrated. Seeker: I've seen both of those! This is hard! Recommender: The great thing about 80s films is you can go back and rewatch them so many times and still enjoy it. I forgot to mention his other hit Total Recall! Its such a great 80s film demonstrating his cheesy yet entertaining acting. Set in the future as a regular working guy, he decides to enter a virtual world type place where he lives a fantasy life of a secret agent. Things go haywire in the process that lead to a crazy action adventure on Mars. Seeker: Oh I haven't seen that one! I'll definitely give that one a look.
resp: You won't regret it! Such a classic and still watchable to this day.

It was a sci-fi movie with a lot of deeper meanings. I have always liked movies that have to do with the future, especially ones that deal in psychology and human behavior. Recommender: Great movie! Are you more interested in newer movies, or no preference? Seeker: No preference, I like any movie with good writing. I also like movies that have many twists and turns. Recommender: Do you like movies with a lot of action in them, or one that are more focused on the story and build up of events? Seeker: I like ones that are more focused on the story and events. I like very complex storylines. Recommender: I think I have the perfect movie for you. Do you enjoy a movie that you want to re-watch after its over because the ending was so unexpected? Seeker: That sounds like the perfect movie, what is it? Recommender: I recommend the 2013 movie Coherence directed by James Ward Byrkit. Seeker: I have not heard of this one before. What is it about? Recommender: Its about a group of friends having a dinner party on the night of a comet passing over Earth. The comet starts to cause a lot of strange things to start happening. After watching it you will want to watch it again to pick up on all the things you learned at the end of the first watch! Seeker: Sounds like my kind of movie. Is it available to watch for free anywhere? Recommender: I believe it is on Hulu but I am not positive. Seeker: Ok thank you so much for the recommendation. I have hulu, so I will go and watch it now.
resp: Perfect I hope you enjoy!
